moreBlocks.articles:
• About
    At Brustin & Lundblad Ltd., we believe our clients are best served by our team approach.
  • Medical Malpractice & Nursing Home Negligence
    After more than 40 years of practice, we at Brustin & Lundblad Ltd. have witnessed firsthand the damaging effects of medical and nursing home negligence.
  • Car & Transportation Accidents
    Whether your injuries were minor or severe, or you lost a close friend of family member in the accident, we at Brustin & Lundblad Ltd. understand that no amount of compensation can relieve the physical and emotional toll of your experience.
  • Workers' Compensation & Construction Site Accidents
    At Brustin & Lundblad Ltd., we are trial attorneys dedicated to protecting the rights and interests of injured workers throughout Cook County.
  • Product Liability
    There are countless products and services that we trust and rely upon throughout our everyday lives. Although these products are woven into our jobs and daily routines, we hardly ever give them any thought until they fail to perform.

description:
Rely On Our Experienced Legal Team To Resolve Your Personal Injury Claim

At Brustin & Lundblad, Ltd., we provide comprehensive personal injury representation to clients in Chicago, Illinois, as well as others throughout the country, including: Wisconsin, Minnesota, Indiana, Texas, Arkansas, Oklahoma, Ohio and Washington, D.C. After more than 40 years of helping the victims of negligence, we understand the pressing needs and concerns of you, our client, as we help pursue the compensation and benefits you deserve. Whether negotiating a settlement or taking your case to trial, we tirelessly prepare to ensure that nothing is overlooked and that we give you every opportunity to reach a positive outcome.

Our team of attorneys and professional staff handle all types of cases ranging from simple and straightforward to some of the most complex personal injury matters, including:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Pedestrian and bicycle accidents
  • Wrongful death cases
  • Medical malpractice
  • Products liability
  • Premises liability
  • Workers' compensation

Regardless of your situation, we at Brustin & Lundblad, Ltd., believe that you should have access to quality representation when pursuing your claim. That is why we charge nothing unless we settle or recover on your behalf. When you sit down with us during your free consultation, we will listen as you share the details of your situation, ask questions and voice concerns. After we have all the facts, we will take action to see that you are treated fairly by the insurance companies and that you receive just compensation to help you recover comfortably.

If you or someone close to you has suffered an injury due to the negligence of another, contact us and speak with an experienced personal injury lawyer about your options. We offer flexible appointment scheduling as well as foreign language services in both Spanish and Polish.
